document.discussion_title: 5 Times ‘The Donald’ Was The Ultimate Film Villain
document.topic_text: Donald Trump movie sightings have surged in online popularity since the GOP frontrunner and probable presidential candidate first announced he was running. Actually , to be fair, it wasn’t so much the announcement that got Internet
